categoryDefinition: A service package offered by Optimum that includes various telecommunications solutions tailored for business customers.
A mobile service plan offered by Optimum that includes unlimited talk and text, with options for bundling with business accounts.
High-speed internet service offered by Optimum for business customers, providing gigabit speeds and including necessary equipment.
Wireless internet service provided by Optimum for business locations, allowing multiple devices to connect to the internet.
A service option that provides a fixed IP address for businesses, useful for hosting servers or other networked devices.
High-speed internet service provided by Optimum, specifically fiber internet, offering fast and reliable connectivity for business customers.
A telecommunication system that includes features such as caller ID, provided by Optimum Business.
A device provided by Optimum Business that connects to the internet and supports business phone systems.
A feature that automatically activates to maintain internet connectivity during outages, included with new equipment from Optimum Business.
Additional features offered by Optimum Business for phone services, enhancing functionality for business customers.
An upgrade option for internet service that provides higher bandwidth to accommodate business needs.
A type of internet service that uses fiber-optic technology to deliver high-speed internet, characterized by its high bandwidth and reliability.
A standard phone line service for business customers, allowing for communication needs.
Telecommunication service that includes multiple telephone lines for business use, allowing for features such as call forwarding and porting of existing numbers.
A bundled service offering that includes both internet and telephone services at a combined rate, providing cost savings for business customers.
A promotional offer that waives installation fees for new customers setting up Optimum services.
A broadband internet service provided by Optimum Business, designed to support multiple devices and high data usage.
Telecommunication lines provided by Optimum for business use, allowing multiple simultaneous calls.
Television service that includes various channels and programming options, tailored for business needs.
Devices provided by Optimum that allow businesses to access cable television services.
Equipment provided by Optimum to enable internet connectivity and network access for business customers.
Technical assistance offered by Optimum for troubleshooting network issues and device problems.
A service that ensures continuous internet access even during outages, provided by Optimum.
A payment option that allows customers to set up recurring payments for their Optimum services.
A high-speed internet service that supports multiple devices and high-demand applications, ideal for businesses like restaurants.
Telecommunication services that include the provision of phone numbers and calling capabilities for business customers.
A feature that allows incoming calls to be redirected to another phone number if the primary line is busy.
A device that routes internet traffic within a business's local network, allowing multiple devices to connect to the internet.
A backup internet service that activates if the primary internet connection fails, ensuring continuous connectivity.
A high-speed internet service offering X gigabit bandwidth, suitable for businesses requiring substantial data transfer capabilities.
A service that provides coverage for equipment and services, ensuring that business operations remain uninterrupted in case of issues.
A device that activates to maintain internet connectivity during outages, ensuring critical business functions remain operational.
An internet service that provides speeds of up to 1 gigabit per second, suitable for businesses with high data demands.
Telecommunication service that provides mobile phone lines for business use, allowing for communication on the go.
Service that offers mobile data plans for tablets, enabling businesses to stay connected with portable devices.
Internet services that support Point of Sale systems, ensuring reliable connectivity for business transactions.
A service plan that allows customers to use Optimum's services on a month-to-month basis without a long-term commitment.
A customer satisfaction guarantee that allows customers to receive a refund if they are not satisfied with the service within a specified period.
A combination of internet and phone services offered at a discounted rate when subscribed together.
